entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation, along with its subsidiaries, is a pioneering company in accelerated computing that has expanded from an original focus on PC graphics to several computationally intensive fields such as scientific computing, artificial intelligence, data science, autonomous vehicles, robotics, and augmented and virtual reality.

entities.name: NVIDIA MANAGEMENT
entities.description: The management team at NVIDIA responsible for making forward-looking statements based on their beliefs and available information.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA's management team makes forward-looking statements and assumptions about the company's future results, performance, and achievements.
